data.name: Alice
data.text: Cool, everyone says $Milgrom$ deserves it from my entrance into college.

post.text:
#速报#

	
			
			The Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences has decided to award 
the 2020 Sveriges Riksbank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel to
		
	
			
			Paul R. Milgrom   Robert B. Wilson   		
	
			
			"for improvements to auction theory and inventions of new auction formats"
